prompt_text: When the Office WLED is turned on, wait 2 seconds, then turn on all living room lights to 70%, wait another 3 seconds, and set the Office WLED to 100% brightness
automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_followup'
alias: Office WLED Living Room Follow-Up Brightness
description: "When Office WLED turns on, set Living Room to 70% after 2s, then Office to 100% after 3s"
mode: restart
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.wled
    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'
conditions: []
action:
  - delay: '00:00:02'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 70
  - delay: '00:00:03'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 100

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, office, living
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten
